value.name: Madrid - Wikipedia
value.snippet: Madrid (/ m ə ˈ d r ɪ d / mə-DRID, Spanish: [maˈðɾið]) is the capital and most populous city of Spain.The city has almost 3.4 million inhabitants and a metropolitan area population of approximately 6.7 million. It is the second-largest city in the European Union (EU), and its monocentric metropolitan area is the second-largest in the EU. The municipality covers 604.3 km 2 (233.3 sq mi ...

value.name: Tourism in Madrid: what to do in Madrid | spain.info
value.snippet: Madrid, cheerful and vibrant at all hours, is famous for being an open city with all kinds of people from anywhere in the world. value.name: Madrid, Spain 2023: Best Places to Visit - Tripadvisor
value.snippet: The storybook capital of Spain, fueled by Spanish food and wine. If Madrid feels like a fairytale, it’s partially because so many buildings here have a confectionary, castle-like look to them. Even City Hall is astounding, with its white pinnacles and neo-Gothic features.
